headline: The Mosaic Company (MOS) to Sell Mosaic Potash Carlsbad Operations
summary: The Mosaic Company (NYSE:MOS) is one of the Best Affordable Stocks to Buy According to Analysts. On December 22, The Mosaic Company (NYSE:MOS) announced that it has entered into a definitive agreement with International Minerals Carlsbad to sell its Mosaic Potash Carlsbad operations for $30 million. Management noted that the deal includes the divestiture of […]

headline: Mizuho Sees Continued Pressure on Mosaic (MOS) as Chemical Markets Stay Soft
summary: The Mosaic Company (NYSE:MOS) is included among the 15 Dividend Stocks with Low Payout Ratios and Strong Upside. On December 18, Mizuho analyst Edlain Rodriguez lowered the price target on The Mosaic Company (NYSE:MOS) to $28 from $31 and kept a Neutral rating. The move came as part of the firm’s 2026 outlook for chemicals, […]
